column4: 2015) view/ create memorial website send sympathy card mrs. charles etta carter-randolph was the youngest and the only daughter born to robert l. carter
column5: sr. and martha dunn-carter on july 11
column6: 1932. charles etta accepted christ at an early age. she attended phillis wheatley high school
column7: graduating in the class of 1949. charles etta worked faithfully in her church as a matron with the fellowship choir and the junior mission. she served faithfully as a sunday school teacher and assisted in the kitchen. she was truly a servant of god. charles eta was preceded in death by her husband
column14: jr. she leaves to cherish her precious memories
